entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story who is thrown a cloak by Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another main character in the story who is also thrown a cloak by Hermione and has a rat named Scabbers.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the main characters in the story who throws a cloak over Harry and Ron.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who lives in a cabin and warns Harry, Ron, and Hermione to leave quickly.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat that goes berserk when they are trying to escape.
